string.text: Wolf asked you to purge an area of all mutant threats in order to ensure the safety of rookie village; as well as the stalkers who pass through Cordon. Reach the location and eliminate all mutants around the area. Return to Wolf for payment after you job is complete.

Stalker, I need someone to who is a bit more experienced than the rookies for a task. Cordon is becoming a very dangerous place with all this rampant mutant breeding going on. I need you to hunt around an area that I will mark on your PDA. The job is to kill any mutants you see. If you do this for me, it will earn you some cash. So will you?
Thank you, the rookies will be much safer now because of you. Here is your payment.
The Military's indiscriminate killing from the sky must be stopped. Find a way to take out the Military helicopter in Cordon.

Speak quietly. I know Sidorovich doesn't want us tangling with the Military but what they have been doing with that helicopter is outright murder. I can't stand to see another innocent stalker ripped to shreds by its cannons. If you can find a way to take it down, I will reward you well.
What you have done is legendary. You have saved countless lives.
A stalker is missing from the camp. I need you to go find out what sort of trouble he's gotten himself into.
Thank you. It's stalkers like you that keep this place one of the only safe areas in the Zone.
Lead a group of rookies into the Zone.
A group of rookies is heading out into the Zone for the first time. I need a competent stalker to guide them and keep them safe.
Thank you for keeping the rookies safe, stalker.
